name: Identity Verification
description: Confirms an individual's identity using official documents and databases for comprehensive identity validation.

name: AML, PEPs, and Sanction Check
description: Comprehensive screening for Anti-Money Laundering risks, Politically Exposed Persons, and international sanctions lists.

name: Basic DBS
description: Basic level criminal record check through the Disclosure and Barring Service for unspent convictions.

name: Standard DBS
description: Standard level criminal record check including spent and unspent convictions, cautions, reprimands and warnings.

name: Enhanced DBS
description: Enhanced criminal background check including local police records and barred lists information.

name: Right To Work Check
description: Verifies if a person is legally allowed to work in the UK through document verification and database checks.

name: DVLA Check
description: Comprehensive driver license verification through the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency database.

name: Tax Defaulters Check
description: Verifies if a person or company is listed as a tax defaulter in official government databases.

name: Adverse Credit Check
description: Comprehensive financial background assessment for defaults, CCJs, bankruptcy, and credit history analysis.

name: Director Search
description: Comprehensive search for registered company directors in corporate databases and Companies House records.

name: Scotland Standard Disclosure
description: Criminal record check specifically for Scotland-based cases through Disclosure Scotland services.

name: FCA Firm Check
description: Verification of company registration and regulation status with the Financial Conduct Authority.

name: Knowledge Centre
description: Comprehensive resource hub providing compliance guides, regulatory updates, FAQs, and best practices.

name: Right To Work Request
description: Automated request tool to initiate right-to-work verification processes with candidates.

name: Document Request
description: Secure document collection tool for requesting official documents from clients and candidates.

name: AML Monitoring
description: Ongoing continuous monitoring service for Anti-Money Laundering compliance and risk assessment.
